backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required asset rebinding behavior for CenteredHubLogo.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten highâ€‘level summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup and OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controlling asset validation, overlays, theatre scene, and publish/refresh/resync actions.
frontend/src/components/AssetScanResults: Overlay listing validated assets with refresh, resync, and continue controls.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundSilhou: Background component rendering a huge faint silhouette of logo2-1.png.
Centered hub logo with forced unmount/remount for asset rebinding and a faint halo ring.
frontend/src/components/MissingAssetOver: Blocking overlay showing missing asset message with refresh/resync buttons.
frontend/src/components/PreviewSyncContr: Floating settings popover offering refresh, resync, and validated publish actions.
frontend/src/components/TheatreStageScen: Cinematic theatre environment with curtains, seating, aisle, and lighting layers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future React Query hooks with no current functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequiredAssets.ts: Validates required image assets at startup and on refresh, reporting missing files and load failures.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and global layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers applied.
frontend/src/utils/publishSlug.ts: Implements slug sanitization, validation, and default slug generation based on constraints and hostnames.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, components, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, asset constraints, and known issues for STEP 1 visuals.
